column1: AVEENO...bring this back to the retail market!! The "new" Intensive Night Cream w/ Vit. B3 that Positively Radiant has out does not compare with the original formula......

I love this cream. I get a pimple if anyone says the word pimple ( i hope i don't get one now) but this cream has worked great with me. I was scared to use night cream along with a day cream this is totally different. This cream is very lightweight, and extremely hydrating! Honestly I wake up, look in the mirror and LOVE how great my skin looks at 7AM! I recommend this night cream, along with Aveeno to EVERYONE.
This product goes on smoothly and absorbs quickly without leaving any residue. It has been very gentle on my skin while performing as expected. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product feels wonderful on my face. Absorbs well. My skin is sensitive and it still works good on it. Looks terrific when I awake too. You will be happy with this purchase. Great hydration!

I have sensitive, dry skin and have a hard time finding products that don't sting or cause redness. This has a fantastic gel-cream texture that's still hydrating enough for my dry skin. I really like that it has a light, fresh fragrance and yet doesn't irritate my skin. I haven't been using it long enough to know if it will even my skin tone, but it's a nice night-time moisturizer that I'll continue to use.

I have been using this product for about 2 weeks . The first day I used it i saw a difference. One thing you must remember is to be consistent with your skin care regimen. I absolutely love this overnight facial cream. It's light, not sticky, and it's very soothing to the skin. When you wake up , I'm telling you , your face is brighter and smoother than ever. I am in love with this. This product will not irritate you at all and I have very sensitive skin. So please by all means, give this a try. I am sure you will love it.
I'm very dedicated to a certain skincare product..., but I found this tester inside of a magazine.
Wow! My face was glowing the next day. Guess I'll be adding this to my skincare routine. The best part is it isn't sticky and it didn't burn my eyes.
Thanks!

Just like it says "non-greasy" formula.....This is fantastic. Absorbs quickly. I do not understand why the directions say 2-3 times a week tho. Do not understand how people have 'breakouts' or rashes with your other products either unless they have an unknown allergy to the botanicals placed in them. I love your products
What I didn't like that was I paid $3 more that the MSRP at the local chain pharmacy

I have sensitive skin so I have to be very careful what I use on my face especially. I received a sample in my #walmartbeautybox and used about a nickel sized amount after my shower before bed. It went on smoothly but after about five minutes I had to rinse it off. My eyes started burning and watering and my nose ran like a fountain. Even after washing my face it took about 12 hours for the symptoms to dissipate.

I bought this a month ago after using the intensive night cream for a few years. However, as soon as I started using this new product my face started to break out in huge pimples. Took a break from it for about 1 week and they disappeared. Used it 2 nights in a row again and a big pimple has formed.

Its light and feels nice on skin. I have sensetive skin and there was no irretation or increase on break outs however i haven't used it long enough to notice a difference in tone ir s more even complexion like soy extract is supposed to help with so o can't say if its worth the price which to me is more expensive then products i normally buy

I am a fan of every product in the Positively Radiant line I've tried so far, but this one is my favorite! It smells great, it's very soothing to the skin and light, and when I wake up in the morning my skin has a dewy look to it, and feels really soft the entire day and into the next. The price is not bad, either, as the little tub lasts a long time...I've been using it every two to three nights for three weeks and have over half still to use! I will definitely be using this for a long time to come!
My skin is very soft and hydrated. I know good skin comes from my gene-pool but Aveeno Skin Moisturizer works. It does not feel greasy or heavy.
This product made my face feel amazing! My skin was so soft and it smelled very pleasant! Didn't make my face oily or anything!!

I bought both morning and night radiant moisturizer with excitement. After two tries, I developed a rash on my face. It is very disappointing ! I am not sure what ingredients this moisturizer has that make my skin develop a rash. !
Great price and seems to work better than really expensive products
This helps me alot. I just started using ig snd csn already feel the difference and see it!
I really did like this product and would recommend it. Did not leave my skin feeling oily or too dry. No breakouts.
It's very light does not feel oily and makes your skin feel sucky smooth and firm when you wake up in the morning

Moisturizing, absorbs pretty quickly into skin and the consistency of the cream is nice without it being too thick. Love the mild scent. I was careful not to get any product near my eyes as instructed. It would have been nice to have something that works all over the face. I have oily combination skin and did not experience any breakouts after starting this product which is always a plus for acne prone skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have dry skin and I live in Wisconsin so I'm always looking for hydrating products.Aveeno Positively Radiant Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer works great and helps my skin feels wonderful in the morning. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

AVEENO POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer feels great on my face. I love the light and calming scent, the way it makes my skin feel and the fact that it goes to work on my skin when I'm sleeping. I also really like that it is compatible with my current facial care routine and gives my skin the added hydrating boost that it needs year round! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love AVEENO Positively Radiant overnight hydrating facial moisturizer! I love the cool feeling when applied. It is nice and creamy and it doesn't dry hard. You can't even tell you have it on. It is very easy to wash off. I have been using it twice a week and can really tell a difference in my dry skin! I would definitely continue to use this and recommended to a friend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

POSITIVELY RADIANT 60 Second In-Shower Facial Cleanser is amazing. I love how this so easy to use in the shower. It has little small grain to foliate and clean your face really good. I got this free for testing purposes and for my honest opinion. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] see all 193 reviews write a review [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really liked how creamy this moisturizer was. It was thicker but not pore clogging. It felt cool on my face and didn't leave a greasiness behind. It was gentle and lightly scented and did not irritate my skin. I applied it at night before bed and would wake up to a soft, smooth face. I also applied to my neck as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The AVEENO POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer works very well. It deeply moisturizes my skin leaving it smooth and glowing. It absorbs well and is non greasy leaving my skin looking well hydrated and healthy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

AVEENO POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer is a wonderful product it has a light scent and leaves your skin feeling so soft and renewed the next morning. I have even used it in the morning as a moisturizer too and it works great!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Wow! Aveeno outdid themselves with this great product! I love it! All you have to do is use it 3 times a week instead of your night cream & the difference overnight is amazing! Put it on at night & in the morning your full skin will be hydrated & radiant! I don't get much sleep but this product really makes me look like I got a great nights sleep by also rejuvenating my eye area [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This Aveeno positively radiant overnight hydrating facial moisturizing is beyond amazing I use it 3 times at the week and I wake up with an extreme hydrate face it look very healthy from now Im not using another moisturizer I just use Aveeno positivuky radiant overnight hydrating facial moisturizing and definitely my face change, everyone is asking my what I do with my skin it look different and I just smile and recommend my secret weapon Aveeno skin care !!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am always looking for ways to keep my skin moisturized, especially overnight because I tend to wake up with dry skin, so I was excited to try Aveeno Positively Radiant Overnight Facial Moisturizer and I was not disappointed! It felt good on my skin, not too greasy and not too watery, just nice and lush and refreshing on my skin. I am used to waking up with dry patches, but my skin looked and felt so much better after using this product! I am a believer! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am someone who has extremely dry skin and I absolutely love this overnight hydrating mask. I love how it feels cool on my face and i can't tell it helps make my skin feel less dry. I also love the smell of the mask it's not too strong. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the AVEENO POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer. It feels good and smells amazing. PLUS, It leaves my face feeling smooth and soft. Since it is winter I have to make sure my skin stays moisturized and this is so helpful. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love love love Aveeno's Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer! In the winter months my skin gets so dry. I quickly noticed my skin getting softer after I started using it. The best part, no need to remember to apply it every night. Twice a week before bed. I was considered about it leaving residue on my pillows but there was no issue with this product. Thanks Aveeno. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Achieve rehydrated and soft using skin after continuous use of this overnight facial moisturizer. Wake up to a nourished face without a greasy or oily feel. Pores are not clogged up and your face become radiant with an all over glow. Great for my combination skin my facial skin is glowing [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this is a great moisturizer to use at night during the winter. The formula is a little thicker so it stays on your face and leaves it smooth and soft in the morning. It isn't too greasy and doesn't leave a mark on pillows which I really liked. I feel that in the morning my skin was well hydrated and it evened out skin moisture and dry spots. Overall I really liked it, I would need to use it in the summer to tell if it was too heavy for summer months. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like the Aveeno Positively Radiant Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer! After jut a couple weeks of use, I am noticing my skin is getting a little firmer and is carrying a slight glow! I have even had compliments!! And it's so easy to just put it on before bed and let it work it's magic! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Aveeno positively radiant overnight hydrating facial cleanser worked so well. I typically dislike wearing any product to bed however this was light and left my skin hydrated and smooth as a baby. It was not greasy, smelled lovely and my skin was fresh and glowing. The pair was amazing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I can't stop taking about Aveeno Positively Radiant Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer! Normally, the leading brand moisturizers are what I use & it'll hydrate my face for a couple hours then I'm all oil until I wash my face again. This moisturizer is the bee's knees! It smells like heaven. I even use it on my fiance's stubborn skin. It dries super fast so I can do my makeup immediately & doesn't leave me looking shiny. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've tried several new facial moisturizers this year. Aveno's Positively Radiant Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer has been my second favorite. I like the way my face feels in the morning, but it is a bit sticky when you first put it on. If you go straight to bed your face kind of sticks to the pillow. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My skin felt really nice and soft. I thought it was a great lightweight moisturizer, and it smells wonderful. I had no irritation or weird reactions. I did wish they would leave out some of the chemicals they put in it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This cream has such a luxurious texture to it. Has a great scent, goes on my skin smooth & soaks in well. I prefer to use my moisturizers at night, so this fits right into my routine. I can definitely see the improvement using just a few times a week. This product & the in shower moisturizer works great together, definitely a system I would recommend, and will continue using! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Aveeno has created some amazing products. I found Aveeno Postively Radiant Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer easy to use. Left my skin youthful and radiant. It had a youthful glow gain. The formula is None greasy. I was in love the moment I put it on. #freesamples [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely LOVE this product along with the Positively Radiant Daily Moisturizer!!! I suffered immensely from dry skin from working in dry heat.. Needless to say I was pretty much a scaly lizard lady in the winter!!! But thanks to Aveeno Intensive night cream I am able to put it on before bed with out a heavy cream feeling on my face! When I wake up my face doesn't feel tight or itchy from being so dried out!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The smell is so delicious! This is a GREAT moisturizer for overnight. Its almost as if I don't need a moisturizer the following day. The AVEENO POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer is a real winner for my combination skin type. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My Aveeno Positively Radiant Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer was absolutely amazing! I would wake up in the morning and feel like a completely new person! I suffer from a horribly dry face in the winter months and this truly helped give me a natural glow! I love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using Aveeno Positvely radiant overnight radiant facial mask for the past two weeks. I have terrible dry skin this time of year the winter is so harsh. I have not had that issue since starting the overnight facial mask. I highly recommend this product to others with dry skin issues. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer was a new one for me I use aveeno ultimate calming lotion most days. So I replaced it with this night cream 3 nights a week and woke up with softer nourished skin from the very first night. Exceptional product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved this Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer! It worked it's magic while I slept and I woke uo to bright, beautiful, glowing skin; I was really wowed! It also made my skin feel really hydrated and smooth. Great product, I would fully recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved how this overnight moisturizer didn't leave my pores feeling clogged. It was easy to apply and didn't leave any greasy feeling. When I woke up in the morning, my skin felt so rejuvenated and soft! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really liked this mostrizer. It has a light scent that is very nice. It's not oily like other mostrizers. It leaves my skin feeling soft and refreshed in the morning. It really has helped with my winter dry Skin. I love Aveeno [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have super oily skin, so when i am choosing a moisturizer i have to be carful to prevent breakouts. This overnight moisturizer went on super smooth, is extremely light weight, and full absorbed right into my skin. I really like how alittle goes a long way and how it gave my skin a super soft feel and moisturized and hydrated look and feel. I cant wait to see my results after a longer period of use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

AVEENO Positvely Radiant Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer really does what it says it does - it leaves your skin fully hydrated and Radiant! It goes on so easily and your skin just drinks it up but it doesn't leave a greasy or heavy residue. You definitely notice a difference after using the product. It's great for bringing moisture back into your skin! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a free sample of Aveeno Positively Radiant Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer to try and review. It has a light, clean scent so it is pleasant to use at bedtime. It left my skin feeling soft and smooth. I like that it works overnight while I sleep because that is when my skin is able to absorb it the most. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I started using Aveeno Positively Radiant Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer the night I received my sample. My skin soaks in the formula and is instantly silky, smooth and glowing! This product really works and I am using it in conjunction with the 60 Second In-Shwer Facial...My boyfriend is carressing my face alot and I feel more confident. After only a couple of weeks of using the formula nightly, I can see and feel the results! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I won't be able to live without this moisturizer after using it for so long. I have very dry skin in the winter and after using this a couple of times my skin returned to being normal. I love the shimmery stuff in this that makes my face look like it's glowing. I love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My skin feels moisturized after using this, but I think it's a stretch to call it an overnight facial, especially when the Aveeno in-shower facial product feels more like a facial. To me, it's an overnight deep moisturizer. That being said, during Winter, it has been nice to have more moisture and I do feel like this product gives me moisturized, healthy skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I still have this and use it every night before bed. POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer keeps my face hydrated, which is a problem for me in the winter. I love that there is no strong perfume smell. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am so excited with my sample of AVEENO POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer. Never thought about using an overnight moisturizer before but I am so thrilled at how my skin feels after using this product. Will be purchasing right away! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was absolutely amazed by how effective this product is. The scent is refreshing and I leaves my face feeling so rejuvenated every time I use it. Im so happy that I have introduced to this product, it will definitely be apart of my beauty regimen from here on out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have not used a ton of overnight moisturizers, but was very excited to give this a try. It is gel-like and feels very light on your face, instead of greasy. It absorbed very easily and felt cool on my skin. In the morning when I woke up, my skin still felt moisturized and soft. Love this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Averno positively radiant duo has made my skin feel amazing! The in shower 60 second facial has just the right amount of tingle and grit, that makes your skin feel clean & energized! And the overnight moisturizer makes my skin feel supple & fresh! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I did like the lotion, it looks so beautiful and glittering when you open the bottle, you feel special using it! It rubs in nicely. I have pretty normal skin and It did not leave an oily residue or cause irritation/pimples. In the morning my face felt very soft and hydrated! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After using the 60 second mask, I used this to see what difference I would get. I woke to my face looking like it had already been washed. The under eye circles I have which aren't bad, were visibly lighter. My skin had fresh look to it. Again my husband noticed the difference and now he's using this too. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Aveeno Positively Radiant overnight hydrating facial I used 2 times per week, my skin felt amazing very moist, smooth and refreshed. It's not greasy and it moisturize my skin very well! I would recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a complimentary sample from Crowdtap to review. This AVEENO POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer has a lovely scent. I applied a thick layer on my face nightly, it soaks into the skin incredibly quick and did not leave my skin dealing greasy. It has improved my skin texture very much. It is smoother, glow and hydrated. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The AVEENO positivelyrics radiant overnight hydrating facial moisturizer is great. I like how it makes my skin nice and soft. It also gives it a very nice shine and glow. It know a must have for me. Thanks to crowdtap I got this free for my honest opinion. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Following the in shower Aveeno Facial cleanser and this Aveeno Overnight Hydrating Facial Mosturizer is great combination and gives me a great result. I suffer acne around my jawline and oily skin and this perfectly moisturized my skin, and also no more dark spot. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recieved a sample of AVEENO POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer to try from Crowdtap. I am IN LOVE with this product. The directions say to use a couple of nights a week in place of your normal moisturizer, but Ive used it nightly since Ive got it and my skin has improved so much! I will buy this again [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I enjoyed this Aveeno Positively Radiant overnight hydrating moisturizer. It really hydrates my skin and leaves it feeling smooth and soft. It's almost like a combination of a gel and a cream. It smells great and my skin looks glowy in the morning. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is the first time I've used an overnight facial moisturizer and I am hooked! My skin has been dry these winter months and just after a few uses I really notice the moisture and suppleness coming back to my skin. I am looking forward to using this every week now! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Enjoyed the Aveeno Positively Radiant Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer. Felt light on my skin..Didn't feel heavy or sticky.. My face felt hydrated when I woke up in the morning with out feeling greasy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have really really dry sensitive skin and this has been a lifesaver. You just need a little bit so the jar goes a long way. It is not heavy or greasy feeling which I loved. I really don't have a bad thing to say. I'm glad I would this product no more peeling face for this mom. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My experience with Aveeno Positively Radiant Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer was wonderful. I used it about twice a week and it has a great result to it. I just use a small amount at night and wake up with nice glowing skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was asked to try AVEENO POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer for free for my opinion. I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product!! It smells wonderful and it leaves your face silky smooth.I love the glow this leaves. I sleep in front of a fan and was surprised to wake up with my skin still moisturized. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have tried AVEENO POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer for 2 weeks now, using it it 3 times a week. I was not sure what to expect since I have spots in my face that are dry and moisturizing doesn't always help to get them dry spots moisturized. It took the 3 times in the first week to see them gone. It leaves when put on, a nice feeling, it absorbs pretty quick and doesn't smell too bad. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm am super impressed with the Aveeno Positively Radiant Overnight Hydrating Facial Moistuzer. It makes my skin feel super hydrated and smells wonderful. It leaves my greasy residue and soaks within your skin in minutes. Its also nice there's no rinse required. By far one of my favorite moisturizers. Thanks Crowdtap and Aveeno for allowing me to try it for Free. I will buy in the future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The overnighthydrating facial makes ones skin feel like a babies. Soft n smooth. After applying 2 to 3 per week it nourished my skin. Feeling like I awoke in a new fresh face. I will definitely buy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The hydrating creme of overnight facial moisturizer is really good. I love the smell, it makes your skin very smooth and it really penetrates fast. It's also very relaxing when I put it on my skin. Its like when my skin is tired and body it makes it more relaxed in many ways because of the smell. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This Moisturizer is awesome, It has a pleasant scent and goes on very smoothly. It felt like a spa treatment. It's very easy to use and most importantly, it works amazingly well. My skin felt so much softer after just two uses. The texture is so smooth and feels wonderful on your face. A little dab goes a long way. My face felt literally like a baby's bottom, not overstating it! I loved it and absolutely recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using AVEENO POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer for almost 3 weeks now and I love it. My face feels so smooth in the morning. I love the idea of leaving it to work overnight while I a get a restful sleep. So easy to use and it works! Love the innovative product and I do recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this duo product for my weekly routine. The in shower facial leaves my face feeling clean and refreshed and the overnight Moisturizer leaves it feeling soft but never greasy. A great pair of products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer both leave my skin clean,glowing, and absolutely radiating just like a facial from the spa! It's invigorating,refreshing,and definitely moisturizing. It smells great and is easy to incorporate into my daily routine because you only use it a few times a week! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Aveeno positively radiant overnight hydration facial moisturizer, you wake up feeling like a brand new you. Your skin feels more alive, healthy, young, and bright. This was my first time trying Aveeno overnight hydration facial moisturizer, after my first night you can feel a difference, but after using it a few more night afterwards is when you can feel the brand new you that you have been waiting to feel. I absolutely love Aveeno. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love the AVEENO POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer, apart from the soft skin that this products leave, it has sparklers! I feel like applying silk all over my face. I wake up with a moisturized and clear face. I highly recommend this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love AVEENO POSITIVELY RADIANT Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer! So much so, that I use it during the day too! It leaves my face super soft and glowing. It absorbs really well and doesn't leave me feeling oily like some moisturizers do. I definitely recommend trying this with the Positively Radiant 60 second In Shower Facial from Aveeno too! They work great together. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Just like the In-Shower Facial Cleanser I was hesitant because my skin can be finicky, but my skin looks awesome in the morning. It's not dry or itchy when I wake up. It's not overly oily even though my skin tends to be naturally. It has a slight glow to it which is abnormal for first thing in the morning. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I apply Aveeno active naturals positively radiant overnight hydrating facial three times a week to my face. It gives my face 48 hours of hydration and it's like getting a facial while I sleep. It's non greasy and leaves no residue. It melts right into my skin. My skin feels so soft in the morning and looks radiant. I highly recommend this product. I think you will fall in love with it like I did. I received mine for free from being a member of Crowdtap but my opinions are my own. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the feel of the of my face after I use the overnight moisturizer and how my face feels after I get up in the morning from using it overnight. It is a great product that I will continue to use for years to come. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like this product as it keeps my skins hydrated it also tends to leave my skin oily until the next time I wash my face. Even after washing my face I can tell that there is a difference. I just make sure to wash my face as soon as I get up in the morning to wash the oiliness away. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved this product. I have very oil skin so was a little nervous to use this product because it was so thick. But I LOVE IT. My skin loved it too. I use it at night and the next morning my skin looks glowing (not greasy). An amazing product and I will definitely be purchasing this item and giving it to a few family members as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm amazed with your product! It's quick and easy to use in the shower for those early morning rushes. Throughout the day my face stays feeling soft and looks radiant without being too oily!! I've used both products a total [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Love the smell, and I already knew before trying that I was going to see great results bc I've already tried other Aveeno products and they work great! My skin looks brighter and fresh after one week of use. What's really is awesome is you see results fast and only use it 2 to 3 times a week! Highly recommend it!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've always loved the Aveeno products but I have never trued the Aveeno Positively Radiant Overnight Hydrating before but I love it. I like that its very light and not thick and greasy so it doesn't make my skin feel oily. It blends well and it makes my skin feel soft and smooth. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Amazing skin moisturizer! I received a free sample of Aveeno Positively Radiant Overnight Hydrating Facial Moisturizer, and let me tell you..My skin has never felt this much moisture and hydration from a skin care product. The texture of the moisturizer is creamy, and feels so silky against my skin. This product is now one of my favorite daily skin routines. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a pretty good product. I applied it after using the 60 second in shower facial. It was very soothing and I could feel the moisture sinking in right away. Didn't much care for the texture of the cream but a little goes a long way. My skin was still moisturized when I woke up the next morning. That's a big plus. Thanks again for wonderful products Aveeno [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is great to apply after the 60 second facial cleanser. Again the smell of both these products is awesome. My skin looks, feels, and smells fresh and clean. Themoisturizer helps lock in the moisture and the hydration for overnight protection leaving my skin feeling smooth and soft. The next morning my skin looks refreshed and is ready for the next day. I absolutely love this line and will continue to use going forward. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

When you first open the container you get a strong scent that left me a little nervous about. After applying it to my face I felt like my face was a little tight and felt a semi sticky feeling on me that bothered me since I just took a shower and was going to bed.
